author: ally_ the_duck🦆
ally_ the_duck🦆
text:
3/3
This could also explain why Red's (and Liz's) biggest *weakpoint* -has been spared from any danger so far - Agnes! Neither Katarina nor Kate would ever lay hands on Agnes or allow anything to happen to her!
If I were after Red, I'd start at his weak point. 🙌🤷🏼‍♀️
#TheBlacklist

author: ally_ the_duck🦆
text:
2/3
That'd explain, how Kate/her sister, is involved in this story. Kate has introduced her sister to the business,Red's dead bodies, enemies, associates,made connections. And Kate/her sister,feel committed to Katarina and their love for Liz.
#TheBlacklist

author: ally_ the_duck🦆
text:
1/3
Here's my theory: the real Katarina is alive and seeking revenge bc of her past w Red; Liz's death and so on. The real Katarina had many reasons to kill Red, she had the power, resources and the time to build her own empire. 
#TheBlacklist https://t.co/9YGGEWTVTI
